SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Amara Ostroff’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that students will leave school with a greater understanding of the world and the experiences of their peers…”

– Miss Amara Ostroff, Fox Chapel One Day Leader @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-leave-school-greater-understanding-world-experience-peers/
